description: This file defines the AwsApiClient class, which manages AWS boto3 sessions, including creating and retrieving sessions with optional region and profile configurations.

classes.name: AwsApiClient
classes.description: A client class for managing AWS boto3 sessions, allowing creation and access to AWS sessions with specified region and profile.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the AwsApiClient with optional AWS region and profile.

methods.name: create_boto3_session
methods.description: Creates a boto3 session using the specified region and profile, with error handling.

methods.name: boto3_session
methods.description: Property that returns the current boto3 session, creating it if it does not exist.
